---
description: >-
  Mermaid is a simple markdown-like script language for generating charts from
  text via javascript. Perfect for creating web-based Munro Maps.
---

# Munro Maps + Mermaid.IO

{% embed url="https://mermaidjs.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/" caption="https://mermaidjs.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/" %}

{% tabs %}
{% tab title="Munro Map created with Mermaid.IO" %}
[View Example](https://mermaidjs.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#-IEluaXRhdGl2ZTNcbldheXBvaW50MSAtLT4gSW5pdGF0aXZlNFxuSW5pdGF0aXZlNCAtLT4gSW5pdGF0aXZlNVxuSW5pdGF0aXZlMyAtLT4gR29hbFxuSW5pdGF0aXZlMyAtLiBCZWZvcmUuLSBJbml0YXRpdmU1XG5Jbml0YXRpdmUzIC0uLT4gTWlsZXN0b25lMlxuSW5pdGF0aXZlNCAtLi0-IE1pbGVzdG9uZTJcbkluaXRhdGl2ZTUgLS0--ICogeyBmaWxsOiAjZmFmYWQyICFpbXBvcnRhbnQ7IH0gZGl2IHsgdGV4dC1hbGlnbjogY2VudGVyIH0gIiwiZmxvd2NoYXJ0Ijp7ImN1cnZlIjoiYmFzaXMifX19) - make sure to click on the Initiatives! 

![Munro Map example created using Mermaid.IO](../.gitbook/assets/mermaid-diagram.png)
{% endtab %}

{% tab title="Mermaid Code" %}
```text
graph BT

%% Create Initiatives within Horizons 
subgraph horizon 1
  Now[The Now House]
  Initative1((Initative 1))
  InitativeA((Initative A))
end
subgraph horizon 1
  Initative2((Initiative 2))
  Waypoint1{Waypoint<br/>Decision Point}
  Initative3((Initative 3))
  Initative4((Initative 4))
  Milestone1>Milestone 1]
end 
subgraph horizon 3
  Initative5((Initative 5));
  Milestone2>Milestone 2]
  Goal((fa:fa-flag))
end

%% Link Initiatives 
Now -->Initative1
Now --> InitativeA
InitativeA --> Initative4
InitativeA -. Before .- Initative2
Initative1 --> Initative2
Initative2 --> Waypoint1
Initative2-.-> Milestone1
Waypoint1 --> Initative3
Waypoint1 --> Initative4
Initative4 --> Initative5
Initative3 --> Goal
Initative3 -. Before.- Initative5
Initative3 -.-> Milestone2
Initative4 -.-> Milestone2
Initative5 --> Goal

%% Hyperlinks to your Goal and Initiative definitions
click Goal "https://docs.munromaps.com.au/strategy/the-process/smart-goal"
click Now "https://docs.munromaps.com.au/strategy/product-munro-maps/the-now-house"
click Initative1 "https://docs.munromaps.com.au/strategy/product-munro-maps/what-is-a-munro-card"
click Milestone1 "https://docs.munromaps.com.au/strategy/product-munro-maps/what-is-a-munro-milestone"
click Waypoint1 "javascript:alert('Make a decision here based on data from Milestone1');" "Alert"

%% Style (Also include Mermain Configuration)
classDef goalStyle fill:#f9f, stroke:#333, stroke-width:2px;
class Goal goalStyle
classDef nowStyle fill:lightgreen, stroke:#333, stroke-width:2px;
class Now nowStyle
```
{% endtab %}

{% tab title="Mermaid Configuration" %}
```javascript
{
  "theme": "neutral",
  "themeCSS": ".cluster text {  visibility: hidden; } .cluster rect { width: 100000px; height: 100000px; x: -5000px; stroke: none !important; } .cluster:nth-child(3) > * { fill: #fcfcea !important; }  .cluster:nth-child(2) > * { fill: #fbfbde !important; } .cluster:nth-child(1) > * { fill: #fafad2 !important; } div { text-align: center } ",
  "flowchart": {
    "curve": "basis"
  }
}
```
{% endtab %}
{% endtabs %}
